overview: Private Video Stories is the label that made Private a legend now finally available on DVD, you can re-live those classic porn moments in 7 digitally re-mastered stories starring a host of Private's beautiful girls! Don't miss a naughty brunette pick-pocket getting taught a lesson by two hung studs, two sexy students enjoying some extra-curricular activities, a full blown orgy in a club, a sexy blond chick being banged on the back of a Harley and that's just for starters!
title: Sweet Andy
